column4: i have an MSI GX720 on my other latop. It has an Intel 5100 wifi card
i have an MSI GX720 on my other latop. It has an Intel 5100 wifi card and it doesn't work on ubuntu 10.4
i have an MSI GX720 on my other latop. It has an Intel 5100 wifi card and it doesn't work on ubuntu 10.4. i tried to use WICD and now even my wired connection doesn't work.
You looked in the wiki if the WIFI Card is supported?
